channel.title: Psychic can link in jail again?
channel.description:
#### What happened? Linked someone in jail
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Should be prevented, didn't see anything about changing it in patch notes #### Steps to reproduce: link anyone who is jailed #### Comments: I mean I'm fine either way, honestly, but it's weird to have it come back without any notice and makes me wonder if stuff like faction checks are also getting past jailed like they used to.

item.title: Psychic can link in jail again?
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Yes they can check the patch notes

Looks like I accidently rezzed a thread for the 1 millionth time…

Read full topic
item.source: Psychic can link in jail again?

item.title: Psychic can link in jail again?
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
What happened?

Linked someone in jail

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Should be prevented, didn’t see anything about changing it in patch notes

Steps to reproduce:

link anyone who is jailed

Comments:

I mean I’m fine either way, honestly, but it’s weird to have it come back without any notice and makes me wonder if stuff like faction checks are also getting past jailed like they used to.

Read full topic
item.source: Psychic can link in jail again?
